snippet: Colin McDonald, a second-round draft pick by the Edmonton Oilers in 2003, is in his first Stanley Cup playoffs — with the Islanders.
abstract: Colin McDonald, a second-round draft pick by Edmonton Oilers in 2003, is in his first Stanley Cup playoffs, with New York Islanders; eighth-seeded Islanders surprised many observers by securing their first playoff appearance since 2007, going 11-2-4 in their last 17 games.
lead_paragraph: Colin McDonald, a second-round draft pick by the Edmonton Oilers in 2003, is in his first Stanley Cup playoffs — with the Islanders.

headline.seo: A Long Playoff Wait Ends for the Islanders’ Colin McDonald
headline.main: Like His Team, a Wing Who Kept Plugging Away
headline.print_headline: Like His Team, a Wing Who Kept Plugging Away
